overview: The mysterious Zeden en gewoonten in Tripolis promises us a faithful picture of the customs and traditions of Tripoli, but it sometimes has the feeling of a reconstruction in a big open-air set. This trace of doubt casts a magic light on teeming streets, craftsmen weaving carpets, a Bedouin wedding celebrated with gunfire, a snake charmer, races on the back of a dromedary. (Andrea Meneghelli)
title: Zeden En Gewoonten In Tripolis
